channel.title: Media Industry Changes on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Media Industry Changes on FinanClub

item.title: TME
item.description: score:69 Chances: Tencent Music Entertainment Group has renewed a multi-year licensing agreement with Universal Music Group, indicating a strong commitment to creating value for artists and music lovers. The company operates multiple online music entertainment platforms, including QQ Music, Kugou Music, Kuwo Music, and WeSing, positioning it well in the growing music streaming industry.
